short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An interactive CSS playground with extensive GitHub gist-use.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
dabblet is an interactive playground for quickly testing snippets of CSS and HTML code. It uses -prefix-free, so that you won't have to add any prefixes in your CSS code. You can save your work in Github gists, embed it in other websites and share it with others.

This app provides a list of all your dabblets based on the Gists that are available for a username.

==========

The code for this app can be found on GitHub: https://github.com/drublic/dabblet-chrome-app.
Please report bugs over there.

==========

Changelog:

v1.0.0 – Aug. 19, 2012
Add button for viewing gist
Remove hogan.js in favor of an own replacer
Show "view dabblet" link in GitHub newsfeed

v0.7 – Feb. 13, 2012
Add search
Rewrite code-basis based on JS AMD with RequireJS
Display message if user has no gists to display

v0.45 – Feb. 09, 2012
Add a link to fork GitHub:gists on dabblet when visiting https://gist.github.com.
